key.name: only-main-monitor
key.summary: Only remove the top bar of windows in the main monitor.
key.description: If windows are on an external monitor, this setting will ensure the top bar stays visible.

key.name: button-position
key.summary: Button position in the top panel
key.description: Controls whether and where buttons of maximized windows appear in the top panel. Possible values are: "before-app-menu" to display buttons before the application name, "after-app-menu" to display buttons after the application name, "within-status-area" to display buttons within the system status area, "after-status-area" to display buttons after the system status area and "hidden" to not show buttons at all.

key.name: theme
key.description: The name of the theme to use (must be one of the folders in [extensionPath]/themes).

key.name: automatic-theme
key.description: Try to automatically detect the Gtk theme in use. If tis fails, the default one is used instead.

key.name: change-appmenu
key.summary: Use window title to replace the app-menu label.
key.description: The app-menu uses the app-name as the label for the button. Use instead the window title of the focused window.

key.name: app-menu-width
key.description: Maximum length allowed for the title of the app-menu, in pixels.

key.name: title-for-snapped
key.summary: Customize app-menu for vertically maximized windows.
key.description: Customize app-menu in the top bar when windows are snapped to the sides, or maximized vertically.

key.name: buttons-for-all-win
key.description: Show buttons in the top bar even if windows are not maximized, or still have a title bar.

key.name: buttons-for-snapped
key.summary: Show buttons for vertically maximized windows.
key.description: Show buttons in the top bar when windows are snapped to the sides, or maximized vertically.

key.name: hide-buttons
key.description: Works when buttons are set after app menu.

key.name: ignore-list-type
key.summary: Choose from disabled, whitelist or blacklist.
key.description: Disabled: no filtering applied. Whitelist: remove title bar for applications on this list. Blacklist: remove title bar from all applications except the ones on this list.

key.name: ignore-list
key.summary: List of applications in the white/black-list.
